strapiPost.title: Trail Extension Projects Underway In Bella Vista
strapiPost.content:
The City of Bella Vista and Trailblazers are planning two trail extension projects to provide residents with more options for recreation and transportation. 

  • Onward: The Razorback Greenway Extension will add an additional mile to the Greenway, running behind Allen's through the old Berksdale South Golf Course to a new trailhead on Berksdale W and Riordan Rd. 
  • Trailblazing: The Blowing Springs to Metfield Extension will add 1.5 mi of shared-use trail along Commonwealth Rd and Trafalgar Rd, enhancing safety and accessibility.
